snippet: The government has said reducing spending on gasoline subsidies could help close a budget gap, but opponents say it will cause painful inflation.
lead_paragraph: The government has said reducing spending on gasoline subsidies could help close a budget gap, but opponents say it will cause painful inflation.

headline.main: Crowds Protest as Indonesian Lawmakers Raise Fuel Prices
headline.print_headline: Crowds Protest as Indonesian Lawmakers Raise Fuel Prices
